title: Help!! Why isn't ranked flex counting towards inactivity?
body: So I've played ranked flex in the past few days but I keep getting the inactivity warning for ranked. I can't find solo/duo queue (if it's even out yet?) and I don't know what to do. Keep in mind I'm still in placements in ranked flex, so is that why?

replies.body: It's a known issue at the moment, but not to worry, it's simply a display issue that you're seeing. Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uU8jXIVo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-17T04:21:44.956+0000)
>
> It's a known issue at the moment, but not to worry, it's simply a display issue that you're seeing. Let me know if you have any questions.

So I can't get demoted (since I'm currently 0 lp in play 4) and I won't lose lp in general?
You can still lose LP by losing games, but you won't decay at the moment, since the message is simply an error.
